text:
@PoliticusSarah @ejeancarroll : As we await the results of @realDonaldTrump's coronavirus test, I respectfully suggest he take another test-a cheek swab.
DNA from Trump, based on a forensic analysis of the dress I was wearing, could prove my defamation case...(which he has been trying to DELAY!)
